query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS escalation_report_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  config_id INT NOT NULL,
  report_period_start BIGINT NOT NULL,
  report_period_end BIGINT NOT NULL,
  total_alerts INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  resolved_alerts INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  pending_alerts INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  avg_resolution_time_minutes INT,
  emails_sent INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  webhooks_sent INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('sent', 'partial', 'failed') NOT NULL,
  error_message TEXT,
  report_data TEXT,
  sent_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  created_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_report_history_config (config_id),
  INDEX idx_report_history_sent (sent_at)
);

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  config_id INT NOT NULL,
  report_period_start BIGINT NOT NULL,
  report_period_end BIGINT NOT NULL,
  total_alerts INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  resolved_alerts INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  pending_alerts INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  avg_resolution_time_minutes INT,
  emails_sent INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  webhooks_sent INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('sent', 'partial', 'failed') NOT NULL,
  error_message TEXT,
  report_data TEXT,
  sent_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  created_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_report_history_config (config_id),
  INDEX idx_report_history_sent (sent_at)
);
